ex: Your application still needs additional information.
ipaExTrans: jɔːr ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃ(ə)n stɪl niːdz əˈdɪʃənl ˌɪnfəˈmeɪʃən.
exMeaning: Ứng dụng của bạn vẫn cần thêm thông tin.
exSecond: I'll give you an additional assignment.
exSecondIpa: aɪl gɪv juː ən əˈdɪʃənl əˈsaɪnmənt.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi sẽ giao cho bạn một nhiệm vụ bổ sung.
context: more than was first mentioned or is usual

ex: I never addmited I did that.
ipaExTrans: aɪ ˈnɛvər ədˈmɪtɪd aɪ dɪd ðæt.
exMeaning: Tôi không bao giờ thừa nhận tôi đã làm điều đó.
exSecond: He never admits when he makes mistakes.
exSecondIpa: hiː ˈnɛvər ədˈmɪts wɛn hiː meɪks mɪsˈteɪks.
exSecondMeaning: Anh ấy không bao giờ thừa nhận khi anh ấy mắc lỗi.
context: to agree, often unwillingly that something is true
usagePattern01: admit to something => Don't be afraid to admit to your mistakes.
usagePattern02: admit to doing something => She admits to being strict with her children.
usagePattern03: admit something => He admitted all his mistakes.
usagePattern04: admit (that)… They freely admit (that) they still have a lot to learn.
usagePattern05: admit to somebody that… I couldn't admit to my parents that I was finding the course difficult.
usagePattern06: admit doing something => She admitted having driven the car without insurance.

ex: We can still work together if we don't agree.
ipaExTrans: wiː kæn stɪl wɜːk təˈgɛðər ɪf wiː dəʊnt əˈgriː.
exMeaning: Chúng tôi vẫn có thể làm việc cùng nhau nếu chúng tôi không đồng ý.
exSecond: I agree completely.
exSecondIpa: aɪ əˈgriː kəmˈpliːtli.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi hoàn toàn đồng ý.
context: to have the same opinion as somebody; to say that you have the same opinion
usagePattern01: agree to something => Do you think he'll agree to their proposal?
usagePattern02: agree (that)… => She agreed (that) I could go early.
usagePattern03: agree to do something => She agreed to let me go early.
usagePattern04: agree on something => Can we agree on a date?
usagePattern05: agree something => They met at the agreed time
usagePattern06: agree what, where, etc… We couldn't agree what to do.

ex: I'll announce the news tomorrow.
ipaExTrans: aɪl əˈnaʊns ðə njuːz təˈmɒrəʊ.
exMeaning: Tôi sẽ thông báo tin tức vào ngày mai.
exSecond: She excitedly announced that she was getting married.
exSecondIpa: ʃiː ɪkˈsaɪtɪdli əˈnaʊnst ðæt ʃiː wɒz ˈgɛtɪŋ ˈmærɪd.
exSecondMeaning: Cô hào hứng tuyên bố rằng mình sắp kết hôn.
context: to tell people something officially, especially about a decision, plan, etc…
usagePattern01: announce something => They haven't formally announced their engagement yet.
usagePattern02: announce that… We are pleased to announce that all five candidates were successful.
usagePattern03: it is announced that… It was announced that new speed restrictions would be introduced.
usagePattern04: announce something to somebody => The government yesterday announced to the media plans to create a million new jobs.

ex: I apologize for the inconvenience.
ipaExTrans: aɪ əˈpɒləʤaɪz fɔː ði ˌɪnkənˈviːniəns.
exMeaning: Tôi xin lỗi vì sự bất tiện.
exSecond: There is no need to apologize.
exSecondIpa: ðeər ɪz nəʊ niːd tuː əˈpɒləʤaɪz.
exSecondMeaning: Không cần phải xin lỗi.
context: to say that you are sorry for doing something wrong or causing a problem

ex: My boss approved the contract.
ipaExTrans: maɪ bɒs əˈpruːvd ðə ˈkɒntrækt.
exMeaning: Sếp tôi đã phê duyệt hợp đồng.
exSecond: I'm sorry if you do not approve of my decision.
exSecondIpa: aɪm ˈsɒri ɪf juː duː nɒt əˈpruːv ɒv maɪ dɪˈsɪʒən.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi xin lỗi nếu bạn không tán thành quyết định của tôi.
context: to think that somebody/something is good, acceptable or suitable
usagePattern01: approve of somebody/something => Do you approve of my idea?
usagePattern02: approve of somebody doing something => She doesn't approve of me leaving school this year.
usagePattern03: (formal) approve of somebody’s doing something => She doesn't approve of my leaving school this year.

ex: I rarely argue with my brothers.
ipaExTrans: aɪ ˈreəli ˈɑːgjuː wɪð maɪ ˈbrʌðəz.
exMeaning: Tôi hiếm khi tranh luận với anh em của tôi.
exSecond: Don't argue with your mother!
exSecondIpa: dəʊnt ˈɑːgjuː wɪð jɔː ˈmʌðə!
exSecondMeaning: Đừng tranh cãi với mẹ!
context: to speak angrily to somebody because you disagree with them
usagePattern01: argue (with somebody) (about/over something) We're always arguing with each other about money.

ex: Jack always blames others for his mistakes.
ipaExTrans: ʤæk ˈɔːlweɪz bleɪmz ˈʌðəz fɔː hɪz mɪsˈteɪks.
exMeaning: Jack luôn đổ lỗi cho người khác về lỗi lầm của mình.
exSecond: I blame myself.
exSecondIpa: aɪ bleɪm maɪˈsɛlf.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi trách mắng bản thân mình.
context: to think or say that somebody/something is reponsible for something bad

ex: I'll brief the staff before moving forward.
ipaExTrans: aɪl briːf ðə stɑːf bɪˈfɔː ˈmuːvɪŋ ˈfɔːwəd.
exMeaning: Tôi sẽ tóm tắt nhân viên trước khi tiến về phía trước.
exSecond: The president was briefed on the situation.
exSecondIpa: ðə ˈprɛzɪdənt wɒz briːft ɒn ðə ˌsɪtjʊˈeɪʃən.
exSecondMeaning: Tổng thống đã được thông báo về tình hình.
context: to give someone detailed instructions or information

ex: Take a look at our travel brochure!
ipaExTrans: teɪk ə lʊk æt ˈaʊə ˈtrævl ˈbrəʊʃjʊə!
exMeaning: Hãy xem tài liệu du lịch của chúng tôi!
exSecond: My business needs 500 brochures with color.
exSecondIpa: maɪ ˈbɪznɪs niːdz 500 ˈbrəʊʃjʊəz wɪð ˈkʌlə.
exSecondMeaning: Doanh nghiệp của tôi cần 500 tờ rơi với màu sắc.
context: a small magazine or book containing pictures and information about something or advertising something

ex: This means certain failure.
ipaExTrans: ðɪs miːnz ˈsɜːtn ˈfeɪljə.
exMeaning: Điều này có nghĩa là nhất định thất bại.
exSecond: I'm not certain about that.
exSecondIpa: aɪm nɒt ˈsɜːtn əˈbaʊt ðæt.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi không chắc về điều đó.
context: that you can rely on to happen or to be true

ex: Use a comma when you're writing lists!
ipaExTrans: juːz ə ˈkɒmə wɛn jʊə ˈraɪtɪŋ lɪsts!
exMeaning: Sử dụng dấu phẩy khi bạn viết danh sách!
exSecond: Your essay needs a lot of commas.
exSecondIpa: jɔːr ˈɛseɪ niːdz ə lɒt ɒv ˈkɒməz.
exSecondMeaning: Bài luận của bạn cần rất nhiều dấu phẩy.
context: the mark (.) used to separate the items in a list or to show where is a slight pause in a sentence

ex: We've received a lot of complaints about your attitude.
ipaExTrans: wiːv rɪˈsiːvd ə lɒt ɒv kəmˈpleɪnts əˈbaʊt jɔːr ˈætɪtjuːd.
exMeaning: Chúng tôi đã nhận được rất nhiều phàn nàn về thái độ của bạn.
exSecond: I don't want to hear one more complaint from you.
exSecondIpa: aɪ dəʊnt wɒnt tuː hɪə wʌn mɔː kəmˈpleɪnt frɒm juː.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi không muốn nghe thêm một lời phàn nàn từ bạn.
context: a statement that something is wrong or not satisfactory

ex: Complete your tasks on time!
ipaExTrans: kəmˈpliːt jɔː tɑːsks ɒn taɪm!
exMeaning: Hoàn thành nhiệm vụ đúng hạn!
exSecond: Have you completed the homework?
exSecondIpa: hæv juː kəmˈpliːtɪd ðə ˈhəʊmˌwɜːk?
exSecondMeaning: Bạn đã hoàn thành bài tập về nhà chưa?
context: to make whole or perfect

ex: There's a big conference next week.
ipaExTrans: ðeəz ə bɪg ˈkɒnfərəns nɛkst wiːk.
exMeaning: Có một hội nghị lớn vào tuần tới.
exSecond: I have to give a speech at the annual medical conference.
exSecondIpa: aɪ hæv tuː gɪv ə spiːʧ æt ði ˈænjʊəl ˈmɛdɪkəl ˈkɒnfərəns.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi phải có một bài phát biểu tại hội nghị y tế hàng năm.
context: a large official meeting, usually lasting for a few days, at which people with the same work or interests come together to discuss their views

ex: Could you confirm some information for me?
ipaExTrans: kʊd juː kənˈfɜːm sʌm ˌɪnfəˈmeɪʃən fɔː miː?
exMeaning: Bạn có thể xác nhận một số thông tin cho tôi?
exSecond: I can't confirm the date now.
exSecondIpa: aɪ kɑːnt kənˈfɜːm ðə deɪt naʊ.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi không thể xác nhận ngày bây giờ.
context: to state or show that something is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence

ex: Contact me when you arrive!
ipaExTrans: kɒntækt miː wɛn juː əˈraɪv!
exMeaning: Liên lạc với tôi khi bạn đến!
exSecond: You should not contact your ex-lover.
exSecondIpa: juː ʃʊd nɒt ˈkɒntækt jɔː ɛks-ˈlʌvə.
exSecondMeaning: Bạn không nên liên lạc với người yêu cũ.
context: to communicate with somebody, especially regularly

ex: You can't convince me otherwise.
ipaExTrans: juː kɑːnt kənˈvɪns miː ˈʌðəwaɪz.
exMeaning: Bạn không thể thuyết phục tôi bằng cách khác.
exSecond: His mother convinced him to study biology instead of music.
exSecondIpa: hɪz ˈmʌðə kənˈvɪnst hɪm tuː ˈstʌdi baɪˈɒləʤi ɪnˈstɛd ɒv ˈmjuːzɪk.
exSecondMeaning: Mẹ anh đã thuyết phục anh học ngành sinh học thay vì âm nhạc.
context: to make somebody/yourself believe that something is true

ex: We'll discuss this later.
ipaExTrans: wiːl dɪsˈkʌs ðɪs ˈleɪtə.
exMeaning: Chúng ta sẽ thảo luận điều này sau.
exSecond: I want to discuss some things with you.
exSecondIpa: aɪ wɒnt tuː dɪsˈkʌs sʌm θɪŋz wɪð juː.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi muốn thảo luận về một số điều với bạn.
context: to talk about something with somebody, especially in order to decide something

ex: That's an extreme decision.
ipaExTrans: ðæts ən ɪksˈtriːm dɪˈsɪʒən.
exMeaning: Đó là một quyết định cực đoan.
exSecond: There's no need for extreme anger.
exSecondIpa: ðeəz nəʊ niːd fɔːr ɪksˈtriːm ˈæŋgə.
exSecondMeaning: Không cần phải tức giận tột độ.
context: very great in degree

ex: These hints may identify the killer.
ipaExTrans: ðiːz hɪnts meɪ aɪˈdɛntɪfaɪ ðə ˈkɪlə.
exMeaning: Những gợi ý này có thể xác định kẻ giết người.
exSecond: I'll give you a hint.
exSecondIpa: aɪl gɪv juː ə hɪnt.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi sẽ cho bạn một gợi ý.
context: something that you say or do in an indirect way in order to show somebody what you are thinking

ex: You don't need to hurry. There is plenty of time.
ipaExTrans: juː dəʊnt niːd tuː ˈhʌri. ðeər ɪz ˈplɛnti ɒv taɪm.
exMeaning: Bạn không cần phải vội vàng. Có nhiều thời gian
exSecond: Hurry or you'll miss the bus!
exSecondIpa: hʌri ɔː juːl mɪs ðə bʌs!
exSecondMeaning: Nhanh lên hoặc bạn sẽ bỏ lỡ xe buýt!
context: to do something more quickly than usual because there is not much time

ex: I don't include my little brother when I invite my friends to play.
ipaExTrans: aɪ dəʊnt ɪnˈkluːd maɪ ˈlɪtl ˈbrʌðə wɛn aɪ ɪnˈvaɪt maɪ frɛndz tuː pleɪ.
exMeaning: Tôi không bao gồm em trai tôi khi tôi mời bạn bè chơi.
exSecond: Is dinner included with this package?
exSecondIpa: ɪz ˈdɪnər ɪnˈkluːdɪd wɪð ðɪs ˈpækɪʤ?
exSecondMeaning: Là bữa tối bao gồm gói này?
context: if one thing includes another, it has the second thing as one of its parts

ex: My cats don't like to interact.
ipaExTrans: maɪ kæts dəʊnt laɪk tuː ˌɪntərˈækt.
exMeaning: Mèo của tôi không thích tương tác.
exSecond: I've never even interacted with him.
exSecondIpa: aɪv ˈnɛvər ˈiːvən ˌɪntərˈæktɪd wɪð hɪm.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi thậm chí chưa bao giờ tương tác với anh ta.
context: to communicate with somebody, especially while you work, play or spend time with them

ex: I need to get some sleep.
ipaExTrans: aɪ niːd tuː gɛt sʌm sliːp.
exMeaning: Tôi cần ngủ một chút.
exSecond: You don't need to be angry now.
exSecondIpa: juː dəʊnt niːd tuː biː ˈæŋgri naʊ.
exSecondMeaning: Bây giờ bạn không cần phải tức giận.
context: to require something/somebody because they are essential or very important, not just because you would like to have them

ex: I'm going to order a pizza tonight.
ipaExTrans: aɪm ˈgəʊɪŋ tuː ˈɔːdər ə ˈpiːtsə təˈnaɪt.
exMeaning: Tôi sẽ đặt một chiếc bánh pizza tối nay.
exSecond: I ordered these shoes last week.
exSecondIpa: aɪ ˈɔːdəd ðiːz ʃuːz lɑːst wiːk.
exSecondMeaning: Tôi đã đặt hàng những đôi giày vào tuần trước.
context: to ask for something to be made, supplied, or delivered, especially in a restaurant or shop

ex: Send me postcards when you're abroad.
ipaExTrans: sɛnd miː ˈpəʊstkɑːdz wɛn jʊər əˈbrɔːd.
exMeaning: Gửi cho tôi bưu thiếp khi bạn ở nước ngoài.
exSecond: The postcard never arrived.
exSecondIpa: ðə ˈpəʊstkɑːd ˈnɛvər əˈraɪvd.
exSecondMeaning: Bưu thiếp không bao giờ đến.
context: a card used for sending messages by post without an envelope, especially one that has a picture on one side

ex: I still need to prepare my lesson plan.
ipaExTrans: aɪ stɪl niːd tuː prɪˈpeə maɪ ˈlɛsn plæn.
exMeaning: Tôi vẫn cần chuẩn bị kế hoạch bài học của mình.
exSecond: Have you prepared the kitchen for inspection?
exSecondIpa: hæv juː prɪˈpeəd ðə ˈkɪʧɪn fɔːr ɪnˈspɛkʃən?
exSecondMeaning: Bạn đã chuẩn bị bếp để kiểm tra chưa?
context: to make something or somebody ready to be used or to do something

ex: I have no reason to be upset, but I am.
ipaExTrans: aɪ hæv nəʊ ˈriːzn tuː biː ʌpˈsɛt, bʌt aɪ æm.
exMeaning: Tôi không có lý do để buồn, nhưng tôi lại buồn
exSecond: He frequently shouted without reason.
exSecondIpa: hiː ˈfriːkwəntli ˈʃaʊtɪd wɪˈðaʊt ˈriːzn.
exSecondMeaning: Anh ta thường xuyên la hét mà không có lý do.
context: a cause or an explaination for something that has happened or that somebody has done

ex: He collects old stamps.
ipaExTrans: hiː kəˈlɛkts əʊld stæmps.
exMeaning: Ông sưu tập tem cũ.
exSecond: Stamps nowadays are too expensive.
exSecondIpa: stæmps ˈnaʊədeɪz ɑː tuː ɪksˈpɛnsɪv.
exSecondMeaning: Tem hiện nay quá đắt.
context: a small piece of paper with a design on it that you buy and stick on an envelope or a package before you post it

ex: As a whole, the concert was a success.
ipaExTrans: æz ə həʊl, ðə ˈkɒnsə(ː)t wɒz ə səkˈsɛs.
exMeaning: Nhìn chung, buổi hòa nhạc là một thành công.
exSecond: He ate the strawberry whole.
exSecondIpa: hiː ɛt ðə ˈstrɔːbəri həʊl.
exSecondMeaning: Anh ăn cả quả dâu tây.
context: a complete thing
